html: It's 2019, but women who work full-time still earn only 80 cents for each dollar earned by men. For women of color, the disparity is even worse. It's time to change that. Proud to join @HouseDemocrats in passing the Paycheck Fairness Act to ensure #EqualPayForEqualWork.pic.twitter.com/mCCASrtVOh
text:
It's 2019, but women who work full-time still earn only 80 cents for each dollar earned by men. For women of color, the disparity is even worse. It's time to change that. 

Proud to join @HouseDemocrats in passing the Paycheck Fairness Act to ensure #EqualPayForEqualWork.pic.twitter.com/mCCASrtVOh

html: I’m proud that the Appropriations Committee passed my bipartisan amendment with @MarkAmodeiNV2 to ensure that no DACA recipient serving in our military can be deported. Dreamers who serve deserve to know they have a future in the country they've risked their lives to defend.pic.twitter.com/npJrvJbLYV
text: I’m proud that the Appropriations Committee passed my bipartisan amendment with @MarkAmodeiNV2 to ensure that no DACA recipient serving in our military can be deported. Dreamers who serve deserve to know they have a future in the country they've risked their lives to defend.pic.twitter.com/npJrvJbLYV
